description:
Velvet Oud Eau De Parfum - A Luxurious Oriental Masterpiece

Experience the opulent allure of Velvet Oud Eau De Parfum, a sophisticated oriental fragrance that captivates with its rich, velvety texture and mesmerizing depth. This exquisite 50ml treasure combines the mystical power of oud with luxurious complementary notes, creating an unforgettable olfactory journey that lingers beautifully on the skin. âœ¨

The Captivating Essence of Velvet Oud

This premium oud fragrance opens with an intoxicating blend that immediately transports you to exotic lands. The rich woody notes intertwine perfectly with sweet amber accords, creating a sophisticated scent profile that's both modern and timeless. Perfect for those who appreciate luxury fragrances with character and staying power. ðŸŒ¿

Product Information
Size 50ml
Gender Unisex
Product Type Eau De Parfum
Concentration High
Brand Luxury Oriental Collection

Exquisite Fragrance Notes That Tell a Story

Note Type Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Saffron, Bergamot, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes Oud, Rose, Jasmine
Base Notes Amber, Vanilla, Patchouli, Musk

Key Features of Velvet Oud Eau De Parfum

  • ðŸ”¥ Long-lasting oud fragrance with exceptional sillage
  • ðŸ’Ž Premium quality ingredients sourced from around the world
  • ðŸŒ¸ Perfectly balanced composition suitable for special occasions
  • ðŸ’« Elegant glass bottle with luxurious detailing
  • ðŸŒ¿ Rich, complex scent profile that evolves beautifully throughout wear

The artistry behind Velvet Oud draws inspiration from ancient Middle Eastern perfumery traditions, where agarwood (oud) has been treasured for centuries for its deep, resinous character. This contemporary interpretation balances the intensity of authentic oud with softer, more approachable elements, making it accessible to modern fragrance connoisseurs while maintaining its exotic appeal.

Discover this new arrival that has quickly become a favorite among fragrance enthusiasts seeking something truly distinctive. The elegant bottle houses a premium oud blend that makes a statement of refined taste and sophisticated style. âœ¨

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Velvet Oud Eau De Parfum last on skin?

Velvet Oud is formulated with high-concentration oils and premium amber fixatives that ensure exceptional longevity. Most users report 8-12 hours of noticeable fragrance presence, with the rich base notes often detectable even after 24 hours. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin. The oud and amber base creates a lasting impression that evolves beautifully throughout the day. ðŸ’«

short_description:
Indulge in Velvet Oud Eau De Parfum, a luxurious oriental fragrance blending precious oud with saffron, rose, and amber. This opulent 50ml treasure offers exceptional longevity and sillage, creating an unforgettable signature scent that bridges traditional Middle Eastern perfumery with contemporary elegance.
